message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a valuable asset that I believe is worth every penny. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,200,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000 to show you I'm serious about making this deal work.  Let's find a middle ground that benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,600,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,300,000 just doesn't reflect the true value of this product. To show my commitment to this deal, I'm willing to drop my price to $1,550,000. This is a fair compromise that considers both our interests. Let's get this deal done.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,550,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product.
